name: WIP cloud game
description:
WASD or arrows to move, space to rain. win by growing all the plants

made for rain jam, this was all i could get done. i originally planned rain jam when i didn't have much going on, but some IRL things happened and caused me to be pretty busy.

i could've definitely done more but that would've required me to crunch and i don't really enjoy that. however i very much enjoyed working on this and i'm looking forward to expanding on it.
